title: BUG: ValueError on ".transform" method applied to an empty DataFrame
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['pandas/core/aggregation.py', 'pandas/core/series.py', 'pandas/core/frame.py', 'pandas/core/apply.py', 'pandas/core/groupby/generic.py'], 'reasoning': "1. pandas/core/aggregation.py is the primary location needing modification; the ValueError is raised here when transforming empty results, which is the direct cause of the bug.
2. pandas/core/series.py invokes aggregation.py's transform method for Series objects; updates may be needed to ensure correct delegation and doc update.
3. pandas/core/frame.py provides DataFrame.transform logic and may be affected similarly; its method should match the intended behavior.
4. pandas/core/apply.py contains shared transformation/apply code that may interact with Series/DataFrame transforms and could need adjustment.
5. pandas/core/groupby/generic.py implements transform for grouped structures; fixes may be needed for consistent handling of empty results in groupby."}
